name: Destination XL Group, Inc.
description: Destination XL Group, Inc. is a leading retailer of big and tall men's apparel in the United States. Established in 1976, the company operates under the Destination XL and DXL Men's Apparel brands, providing a wide selection of high-quality clothing, including casual wear, formal wear, and activewear. With a focus on fit, fashion, and function, DXL aims to meet the unique style and size needs of its customers. The company has transformed the shopping experience for larger men by offering a diverse range of products, including top brands and exclusive labels. DXL's stores are designed to create an inviting and comfortable shopping environment, complemented by knowledgeable staff who provide personalized service. In addition to retail locations, DXL also offers an extensive online shopping experience, making it convenient for customers to find the right fit and style. The company's commitment to inclusivity and customer satisfaction drives its mission to be the ultimate destination for men's big and tall fashion.
